question: Welcome! We're going to ask you some questions, so we can give you the right information for your situation. First, when was your vehicle accident?

options.text: On or after May 1, 2021

heading: About Colors
content: Red is the color of fire and blood. It is associated with energy, war, danger, strength, power, determination as well as passion, desire, and love.

options.text: A CRT decision about responsibility for the accident plus reimbursement of a deductible, increase in premiums, or vehicle repair costs that you already paid because ICBC found you responsible
Only a CRT decision about responsibility for the accident, without a claim for reimbursement
Vehicle damage
Deductibles, insurance premiums, or something else

question: Do you have an agreement with ICBC about the value of the vehicle damage?

options.text: Yes, I have a written agreement with ICBC
Yes, an arbitrator has determined the value
No, I don't have a written agreement with ICBC and an arbitrator hasn't determined the value

content: You may want to get legal advice to understand what you're entitled to and who to make a claim against.Here are some resources that might help:Access ProBonoClicklaw HelpMap is an online tool that can help you find free or low-cost legal advice.You've reached the end of your exploration for this issue.We hope our information and tools help you resolve your dispute.
